title: Lake facing land for sale @ Madapatha road, Piliyandala
details:
Lake facing land for sale @ Madapatha road, Piliyandala


• 450 perches

• Water frontage - Approximately over 220 feets

• The surroundings provide an ideal location for water sports,
bird watching & peaceful boat tours & docking.

• Ideal location for an eco-friendly home, hotel projects or any
kind of eco-resorts.

• The property has many mature trees including Jackfruit,
Coconut, Mango, Siyambala, Belly and Medicinal plants.

• 8km to Galle road
• 25mins drive to Kottawa highway entrance
• Clear carpet Access Road

per perch - 4.35 Laks (Negotiable)
Total value - 1957.5 Laks (Negotiable)
